[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Samoan]: I le tele o seneturi, sa fausia e tagata ma le fa’aeteete ni fale fa’asitepu i luga o fanua gaoā, tifatō seia oo lava i luga o papa maualuga e fa’asaga i le sami.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Samoan]: E 800 maila o le Trans-Alaska Pipeline System, na tapunia ina ua masaa le faitau afe o paelo suau’u i saute o Fairbanks, Alaska
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Samoan]: O vaega i aso nei o Peleseuma sa avea ma vaega o Luxembourg i taimi ua tuanaʻi ae sa suia ia Peleseana ina ua maeʻa le Fouvalega a Peleseana i le 1830.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Samoan]: Talu mai lona amataga, ua avea le Onion ma se malō moni o talafou fa’ata’ita’i, faatasi ai ma se lomiga lolomi, o se ‘upega tafa’ilagi na aumaia le 5,000,000 o tagata asiasi tulaga ‘ese i le masina o Oketopa, fa’asalalauga patino, se sootaga o talafou e 24 itula, fa’asalalauga podcast, ma se fa’alauiloaina lata mai o fa’afanua o le lalolagi ua fa’aigoaina Our Dumb World
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

src_text: Na fa’ailoa e Perry o le a “toe fo’i i Texas e su’esu’e le i’uga o le fono o lenei po, e fa’ailoa ai pe i ai se auala aga’i i luma mo a’u i lenei tamo’ega”, ae mulimuli ane faimai o le a tumau ai pea i lenei tamo’ega ma tauvā ia Ianuari 21 i le South Carolina primary.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Samoan]: I le tele o seneturi, sa fausia e tagata ma le fa’aeteete ni fale fa’asitepu i luga o fanua gaoā, tifatō seia oo lava i luga o papa maualuga e fa’asaga i le sami.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Samoan]: E 800 maila o le Trans-Alaska Pipeline System, na tapunia ina ua masaa le faitau afe o paelo suau’u i saute o Fairbanks, Alaska
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Samoan]: O vaega i aso nei o Peleseuma sa avea ma vaega o Luxembourg i taimi ua tuanaʻi ae sa suia ia Peleseana ina ua maeʻa le Fouvalega a Peleseana i le 1830.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Samoan]: Talu mai lona amataga, ua avea le Onion ma se malō moni o talafou fa’ata’ita’i, faatasi ai ma se lomiga lolomi, o se ‘upega tafa’ilagi na aumaia le 5,000,000 o tagata asiasi tulaga ‘ese i le masina o Oketopa, fa’asalalauga patino, se sootaga o talafou e 24 itula, fa’asalalauga podcast, ma se fa’alauiloaina lata mai o fa’afanua o le lalolagi ua fa’aigoaina Our Dumb World
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Samoan]: I le tele o seneturi, sa fausia e tagata ma le fa’aeteete ni fale fa’asitepu i luga o fanua gaoā, tifatō seia oo lava i luga o papa maualuga e fa’asaga i le sami.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Samoan]: E 800 maila o le Trans-Alaska Pipeline System, na tapunia ina ua masaa le faitau afe o paelo suau’u i saute o Fairbanks, Alaska
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Samoan]: O vaega i aso nei o Peleseuma sa avea ma vaega o Luxembourg i taimi ua tuanaʻi ae sa suia ia Peleseana ina ua maeʻa le Fouvalega a Peleseana i le 1830.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Samoan]: Talu mai lona amataga, ua avea le Onion ma se malō moni o talafou fa’ata’ita’i, faatasi ai ma se lomiga lolomi, o se ‘upega tafa’ilagi na aumaia le 5,000,000 o tagata asiasi tulaga ‘ese i le masina o Oketopa, fa’asalalauga patino, se sootaga o talafou e 24 itula, fa’asalalauga podcast, ma se fa’alauiloaina lata mai o fa’afanua o le lalolagi ua fa’aigoaina Our Dumb World
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Samoan]: E 800 maila o le Trans-Alaska Pipeline System, na tapunia ina ua masaa le faitau afe o paelo suau’u i saute o Fairbanks, Alaska
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Samoan]: O vaega i aso nei o Peleseuma sa avea ma vaega o Luxembourg i taimi ua tuanaʻi ae sa suia ia Peleseana ina ua maeʻa le Fouvalega a Peleseana i le 1830.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

[Samoan]: I le tele o seneturi, sa fausia e tagata ma le fa’aeteete ni fale fa’asitepu i luga o fanua gaoā, tifatō seia oo lava i luga o papa maualuga e fa’asaga i le sami.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Samoan]: E 800 maila o le Trans-Alaska Pipeline System, na tapunia ina ua masaa le faitau afe o paelo suau’u i saute o Fairbanks, Alaska
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Samoan]: Talu mai lona amataga, ua avea le Onion ma se malō moni o talafou fa’ata’ita’i, faatasi ai ma se lomiga lolomi, o se ‘upega tafa’ilagi na aumaia le 5,000,000 o tagata asiasi tulaga ‘ese i le masina o Oketopa, fa’asalalauga patino, se sootaga o talafou e 24 itula, fa’asalalauga podcast, ma se fa’alauiloaina lata mai o fa’afanua o le lalolagi ua fa’aigoaina Our Dumb World
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
